ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tuning random forest with one line. The package is mainly based on the packages 'ranger' and 'mlrMBO'.
Tuning random forest with one line. The package is mainly based on the packages 'ranger' and 'mlrMBO'.

name: r-tuneranger
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.8.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tuneranger
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/tuneRanger_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/tuneRanger/tuneRanger_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9a95253107c0f0a3aceaeea874aa3ee9362961c565818d890778bf6ef8a75aa6

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-bbmisc >=1.11
    - r-dicekriging >=1.5.5
    - r-paramhelpers >=1.10
    - r-lhs >=0.14
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-mlr >=2.11
    - r-mlrmbo >=1.1.1
    - r-ranger >=0.8.0
    - r-smoof >=1.5.1

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-bbmisc >=1.11
    - r-dicekriging >=1.5.5
    - r-paramhelpers >=1.10
    - r-lhs >=0.14
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-mlr >=2.11
    - r-mlrmbo >=1.1.1
    - r-ranger >=0.8.0
    - r-smoof >=1.5.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('tuneRanger')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('tuneRanger')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tuneRanger
  license: GPL-3
  summary: Tuning random forest with one line. The package is mainly based on the packages 'ranger' and 'mlrMBO'.

  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - taylorreiter

# Package: tuneRanger
# Type: Package
# Title: Tune Random Forest of the 'ranger' Package
# Description: Tuning random forest with one line. The package is mainly based on the packages 'ranger' and 'mlrMBO'.
# Version: 0.5
# Authors@R: c( person("Philipp", "Probst", email = "philipp_probst@gmx.de", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Simon", "Klau", email = "simonklau@ibe.med.uni-muenchen.de", role = "ctb"))
# License: GPL-3
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.2), ranger (>= 0.8.0), mlrMBO (>= 1.1.1), parallel (>= 3.3.3), lubridate (>= 1.6.0), lhs (>= 0.14)
# Imports: mlr (>= 2.11), smoof (>= 1.5.1), ParamHelpers (>= 1.10), methods (>= 3.3.3), BBmisc (>= 1.11), DiceKriging (>= 1.5.5)
# LazyData: yes
# ByteCompile: yes
# Date: 2019-04-16
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Suggests: survival, testthat
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-04-16 14:52:16 UTC; probst
# Author: Philipp Probst [aut, cre], Simon Klau [ctb]
# Maintainer: Philipp Probst <philipp_probst@gmx.de>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-04-16 16:02:58 UTC
